text: goal saperlipopette hold functions creating Git messes, users solve, follow https://ohshitgit.com/.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library("saperlipopette") path <- withr::local_tempdir() one_small_change(path) # to be solved with ?one_small_change #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpRwfeWF/file43a62bbed262" # what's in path fs::dir_tree(path) #> /tmp/RtmpRwfeWF/file43a62bbed262 #> ├── R #> └── bla gert::git_log(repo = path) #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   commit                          author time                files merge message #> * <chr>                           <chr>  <dttm>              <int> <lgl> <chr>   #> 1 28555a30455dca4ce4b1d0f214b638… Maëll… 2023-12-15 15:03:34     1 FALSE "feat:… #> 2 7a92f86679f25708d314891b21355d… Maëll… 2023-12-15 15:03:34     1 FALSE "First…

text: "Oh shit, committed immediately realized need make one small change!"

code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() path <- withr::local_tempdir() one_small_change(path = path) # Now add "thing 3" to "bla" # And amend the latest commit }
